alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin, north central Berrien, Turner, northeastern Tift, western Ben Hill and northeastern Worth Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Sylvester to near Alapaha. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ashburn, Ocilla, Mystic, Worth, Sycamore, Rebecca, Gladys, Amboy, Osierfield, Harding, Waterloo, Pinetta, Inaha, Irwinville, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Irwinville Airport, Wray and Abba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift; Turner
